articles.description: The hybrid virus infects neighbouring cells and that too in the presence of antibodies against the influenza virus.
articles.content: For the first time, scientists have detected a hybrid virus that can evade the immune system. The influenza A virus and the respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) can fuse together to form a hybrid virus … [+3912 chars]
